attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I call for the sacking of Children Commissioner for England 
Maggie Atkinson.And the age for prosecution of childern for murder to be lowered 8 YEARS OLD ITS TIME TO GET TOUGH

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
